name: open_treasure
attributes: # [doc = " 宝箱報酬を複数の内部関数で処理する例"]
body: let amount = get_reward_amount (& ctx . accounts . config) ;
transfer_reward (& ctx . accounts . reward_vault . to_account_info () , & ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , amount) ? ;
